attributes.action: Introduce legislation by 2010 to compel the producers of consumer goods to reduce the amount of packing used in those goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A substantial amount of goods, notably food and computer software, contains two to three layers of packaging, sometimes plastic, cardboard, plastic again.  This is unnecessary, generates substantial amounts of waste and is environmentally damaging in terms or producing the packaging and its disposal.
